Text:
The film is supposed to be great. And the video quality here is indeed so, BUT somehow the uploader has put on the WRONG SOUNDTRACK - and what we here is Emma Thompson commenting on her own movie.  
I conclude: DO NOT DOWNLOAD!

hey from chile thanks mfcorrea!
top quality!

Heimdall01,

Read the description.  It clearly states this is a dual-audio rip meaning it has both the actual audio for the film AND a commentary track, which is probably what you heard.  Most media players allow you to select the audio track you want to listen to, for example, Media Player Classic or VLC.
